entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Aurora, Colorado.

Yessenia is selling pupusas on December 5th! Pickup in Denver, Boulder, and Aurora. They’re $3 a piece, vegetarian options available, and 100% gluten free. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co (link in bio)

entry.title: Please support this families
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Please support this families

Sanctuary4All Colorado

Happy #GivingTuesday! Sanctuary4All is an immigrant-led group dedicated to protecting families and improving the lives of Colorado immigrants of all backgrounds.... Founded in 2019 by longtime immigration activist Jeanette Vizguerra, Sanctuary4All works at the intersection of mutual aid and political action. By connecting directly impacted families with caring members of our community we will lift each other up and build a movement to affect positive systemic change for the masses. You can support our mission by purchasing pupusas from Yessenia at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co committing to a monthly donation via Patreon at Patreon.com/Sanctuary4All or donating to sanctuary-4-all on Venmo. 💕✨

See More

entry.title: Happy #GivingTuesday! Sanctuary4All is an immigrant-led group...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Happy #GivingTuesday! Sanctuary4All is an immigrant-led group dedicated to protecting families and improving the lives of Colorado immigrants of all backgrounds. Founded in 2019 by longtime immigration activist Jeanette Vizguerra, Sanctuary4All works at the intersection of mutual aid and political action. By connecting directly impacted families with caring members of our community we will lift each other up and build a movement to affect positive systemic change for the masses. You can support our mission by purchasing pupusas from Yessenia at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co committing to a monthly donation via Patreon at Patreon.com/Sanctuary4All or donating to sanctuary-4-all on Venmo. 💕✨

entry.title: We are asking for the support of the community, since the...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

We are asking for the support of the community, since the solidarity meals are to support each immigrant family in the sanctuary, this time it was the turn of the Blanco Martínez family since the covid situation has reduced Carlos Blanco's hours in the restaurant that works and will be making pupusas for the rent since the covid has affected many families, that is why this program has been created. share please

Sanctuary4All Colorado

Yessenia is selling pupusas for pickup on December 5 in Denver, Boulder, or Aurora. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co
